home.text_1: Arbalet Frontage is an architectural lighting of your building. Daily at dusk, its window light up in colors.
home.text_2: It gives you the opportunity to interact and learn with the environment around you.
home.text_3: By connecting, you will be able to change colors of the facade, enjoy gaming, or even learn computer programming during workshops with a trainer

unreacheable.title: Connect using Wifi
unreacheable.step_1: Approach the main entrance of your building
unreacheable.step_2: Switch on the Wifi connection of your smartphone and select network ARBALET_FRONTAGE
unreacheable.step_3: Close warnings stating that you are not connected to Internet and come back here to play
